author: Rick Stein
title: Baked pumpkin with sun-dried tomato paste and crispy onions recipe
text: Recipes Baked pumpkin with sun-dried tomato paste and crispy onions recipe Rick Stein's new book and TV series is a culinary road trip through the East and West of the former Byzantine Empire. This comforting fragrant dish is an easy crowd-pleaser Baked pumpkin - the perfect Autumnal dish Photo: Courtesy of BBC books By Rick Stein
